那個大叔或許會知道
解決的辦法。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19337.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Oh, Branch Manager! With everything thats
been going on the forest spirits have become
enraged and are turning everyone into monsters!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19337.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「た　大変だ　支部長のおっさん！
　森の精霊たちが　怒りだして
　みんな　じんめんじゅに　なっちまったぁ！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19337.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 크, 큰일이야, 지부장 영감님!
　숲의 정령들이 분노해서
　다들 인면수가 되고 말았어!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19337.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>不、不好啦，支部长大叔！
森林的精灵们发怒了，
大家都变成了人面树！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19337.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>不、不好啦，分部長大叔！
森林的精靈們發怒了，
大家都變成了人面樹！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19338.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>...Ahh. I felt a strange wind rustling through
the forest earlier. That must be responsible
for the people turning into monsters..<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19338.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「……やはり　先ほど感じた
　異様な　森のざわめきは
　そういうことであったか。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19338.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: ……역시 조금 전에 느낀
　기이한 숲의 파장은 그것이었나.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19338.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……果然刚才感觉到
森林里异常的聒噪就是
这回事啊。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19338.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>……剛才感受到
森林異常地不平靜，
果然就是這麼回事啊。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19339.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>I've been protecting the beauty of Molinara
for thirty years. I had hoped this day would never
come. And to think that Renosu and Yugiri are...<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19339.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「モリナラの自然を守って　３０年。
　この日の来ないことを　祈っておったが
　そうか　レーノスと　ユウギリまで……。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19339.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 모리나라의 자연을 지킨 지 어언 30년.
　이날이 오지 않기를 기원했건만
　레노스와 유우기리까지…….<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19339.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我保护了万橡的自然环境３０年。
一直都在祈祷这一天不要来临，
原来连雷诺斯和夕雾也……<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19339.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我保護了莫利納拉的自然環境３０年。
一直都在祈禱這一天不要來臨，
原來連雷諾斯和夕霧也……<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19340.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>Are you saying you knew this would happen,
old man? If that's true then you must know how
to fix it.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19340.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「知ってたのかよ　おっさん！？
　もしかして　どうしたら　あいつらを
　元に戻せるかも　見当ついてんのか？<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19340.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 영감님, 알고 있었어!?
　그럼 혹시 그 녀석들을
　원래대로 되돌릴 방법도 알아?<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19340.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>大叔你早就知道了啊？！
难不成连怎样让他们
恢复原样也知道？<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19340.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>大叔你早就知道了嗎！？
該不會也知道該怎樣做
才能讓他們恢復原狀吧？<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19341.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>There is surely a way... But it is dangerous.
It is not something that I can teach you easily.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19341.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「方法が　ないわけではない……はずじゃ。
　だが　それは　危険をともなう。
　簡単に　教えていいものではないのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19341.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 방법이 없는 것은…… 아닙니다.
　다만 위험이 따르는 일이라
　쉽게 가르쳐 드릴 수는 없습니다.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19341.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>也不是没有办法……
但是，那实在是太危险了。
不能随随便便就告诉你们。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19341.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>也不是沒有辦法……
但是，那實在是太危險了。
不能隨隨便便就告訴你們。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19342.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>This is no time to worry about safety,
these are our men out there. We have to do
something to stop it!<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19342.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「おっさんの部下だって　巻き込まれてんのに
　そんなこと言ってる場合かよ！
　……じゃあ　どうすりゃいいんだ！？<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19342.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 영감님 부하들도 휘말렸는데
　지금 그런 소리 할 때야!?
　……그럼 어떻게 하면 되는데!?<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19342.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>大叔你的部下都出事了，
你怎么还在说这种话！
……那我们到底该怎么办啊？！<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19342.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>大叔的部下都出事了，
你怎麼還在說這種話！
……那我們到底該怎麼辦啊！？<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19343.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Yes, you're right. If <pc> has gained
enough strength and is ready you must go
to the Ranger headquarters of Kamiharmui.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19343.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「そうじゃな。<pc>が　 
　充分にチカラをつけ　時が満ちたら
　カミハルムイの本部へ　行くのじゃ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19343.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그렇지, <pc> 자네가
　충분히 힘을 길러 때가 됐다 싶으면
　카미하루무이에 있는 본부로 가게.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19343.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>这样吧，等<pc>
拥有了足够力量，时机到来之时，
就前往神春无为的总部吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19343.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>這樣吧，等<pc>
擁有了足夠力量，時機到來之時，
就前往卡密哈爾姆的總部吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19344.en:
When you arrive there, headquarters will assess you. If you are deemed worthy then you will be taught how to appease the anger
of the spirits.
19344.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「そのとき　お前さんに　資格ありと
　本部が認めれば　精霊たちの怒りを
　鎮める方法を　教えてもらえるじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19344.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그때 본부에서 자네에게 자격이 있다고
　판단하면 정령들의 분노를
　잠재울 방법을 가르쳐 줄 걸세.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19344.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>如果那时，
总部认可了你的实力，
就会告诉你平息精灵之怒的方法。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19344.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>如果那時，
總部認可了你的實力，
就會告訴你平息精靈之怒的方法。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19345.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>Anyway, for the time being there is nothing else we
can do. In the meantime, please take this.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19345.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「とにかく　今は　どうにもならん。
　とりあえず　これを受け取りなさい。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19345.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 어쨌든 지금은 방법이 없네.
　일단 이걸 받게나.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19345.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>总之，现在没有任何办法。
先收下这个吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19345.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>總之，現在沒有任何辦法。
先收下這個吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19346.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001><pc> was able to resist the wrath of	he forest because they have the spirit Spiel
inhabiting their body.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19346.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「<pc>が　森の怒りから逃れられたのは
　その身体に　スピルどのを宿す
　選ばれし　レンジャーだったからじゃろう。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19346.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: {pc}|hpp(이,가) 숲의 분노를 피한 것은
　몸에 스필 님이 깃든
　선택받은 레인저였기 때문일 테지.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19346.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001><pc>之所以能够幸免于森林之怒，
是因为身体中寄宿有斯比尔大人，
是被选中的游侠吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19346.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001><pc>之所以能夠倖免於森林之怒，
應該就是因為他是被選上的遊俠，
身上寄宿著斯比爾大人吧。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19347.en:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>I'm sure that you will be able to handle
the situation. I'm confident of that.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19347.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>「その　お前さんならば　きっと
　今の状況も　どうにか　できる……。
　わしは　そう信じておるぞ。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19347.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>: 그런 자네라면 반드시
　이 상황을 타개할 수 있으리라고…….
　난 믿네.<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19347.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我坚信
如果是你，
肯定能够解决当前的问题……<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19347.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01514 _normal m00001>我堅信……
如果是你，肯定能解決
當前的問題。<stop_lip_animation n01514 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19348.en:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>I don't think we're going to be any help just
hanging around here. I think we should
take off for now, partner.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19348.ja:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>「ここにいても　あいつらを
　助けることはできそうにねえ……。
　くやしいけど　今は　戻ろうぜ　相棒。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19348.ko:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>: 여기 있어도 그 녀석들을
　구할 방법은 없을 것 같군…….
　아쉽지만 지금은 일단 돌아가자.<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19348.zh-Hans:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>就算待在这里，也没有办法救他们……
虽然很不甘心，
但现在还是回去吧，搭档。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19348.zh-Hant:
<start_lip_sync n01602 _normal m00001>就算待在這裡，也沒辦法救他們……
雖然很不甘心，
但現在還是回去吧，搭檔。<stop_lip_animation n01602 CLOSE_MOUTH>
